ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 20 is a great price for this item... I had to pay nearly 40pp for mine... Though, if you developed piercing the Dirk is much better than a Combine LS. I
ygData.messageBody:
> > From: "Reedo" <reedo@...>
> >
> > Ok you've all convinced me. Plus I got to actuall see one. But I need
>to
> > know one thing. What is the right price to pay for a Dragoon Dirk? The
> > best place to get them is Felwithe right? Its my understanding that
>they
> > come from crushbone. Any help would be greatly appriciated.
>
>I've seen them going from 10 to 100 plat, honestly. Twenty plat is
>probably a
>fair price for one though. See if you can get it for less though by going
>right to the source! I bet there are people camping Dvinn in Crushbone who
>can't loot another one until they sell the one they're carrying, and would
>be
>anxious to sell it quickly if someone had the cash.

20 is a great price for this item... I had to pay nearly 40pp for mine...
Though, if you developed piercing the Dirk is much better than a Combine LS.
I plan to carry a Combine LS and a Dirk at Level 17.

-Kaitan
Senior Minstrel, The New Templars
Cazic-Thule
